title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version Graphs GitHub :

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic example shows plotgraph() returns graphs made R. example, datasaurus plot.  Without input, plotgraph() function returns available graphs. case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(Graphs) ## basic example code plotgraph("datasaurus.R") plotgraph() #> Error: Please run `plotgraph()` with a valid name as an argument. #> Valid examples are: 'anscombe_quartet.R', 'boxplot_illustration.R', 'boxplot_pitfalls.R', 'data_joins.R', 'datasaurus.R', 'gapminder.R', 'pacman.R', 'simpson.R', 'ucb_admission.R'
